attributes.text: We put together this handy template of various multi-touch controller layouts that can be used for a variety of game styles. The best part is all of these control layouts are completely cross compatible between touch devices and keyboard-only devices! This means your game will be playable on touch devices like the iPhone as well as web platforms like GameSalad Arcade without time-consuming redesigns!

There is a Game Attribute called "ControlVisibilityOn" that is checked by default. This will allow the player to see the on-screen controls when the game is running. If you would like your controls to be invisible to the player while on the web, uncheck this Attribute and then publish your game. At run time the controls will not be visible on screen but still function with the keyboard. If your game will allow the option for the player to choose whether or not they want the controls visible then associate the "ControlVisibilityOn" attribute with a button in the game that will toggle it on and off.

Thumbstick_Style1: virtual analog movement WITH rotation Thumbstick_Style2: virtual analog movement WITHOUT rotation TwinStick_Style1: Left stick controls movement and rotation. Right stick controls bullet trajectory. DPad_Style1: Tank style controls - UP/DOWN move back and forth, LEFT/RIGHT rotate. DPad_Style2: Traditional DPad (digital) movement buttons

The contents of this template are our gift to you. Please feel free to use the behavior logic and artwork contained in this project in your own games. If you make any edits or omissions to the core logic contained in the controller actors we cannot guarantee their full compatibility across all platforms. Please only do so at your own discretion.
